content.rendered: Hannah’s another ‘neighbouring spirit’. We were pals at the start of primary school and have managed to stay in touch despite the fact that we grew up in different countries after the age of 7. She loves vintage style and makes much of her own garb (though not the frock in this pic), as well as being a talented artist and remarkable cake-maker (among many other things).
